title.en: Biographies of Qu Yuan and Master Jia
title.raw: 《屈原賈生列傳》 Biographies of Qu Yuan and Master Jia

sentences.zh: 屈原者，名平，楚之同姓也。

translations.text: Qu Yuan, named Ping, was of Chu's royal clan.

sentences.zh: 為楚懷王左徒。

translations.text: He served as Chu King Huai's left aide.

sentences.zh: 博聞彊志，明於治亂，嫻于辭令。

translations.text: Broad in learning and strong in will, clear on order and chaos, skilled in rhetoric.

sentences.zh: 入則與王圖議國事，以出號令；

translations.text: When in court he consulted with the king on state affairs and issued commands;

sentences.zh: 出則接遇賓客，應對諸侯。

translations.text: When abroad he received guests and responded to feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 王甚任之。

translations.text: The king relied on him greatly.

Qu Yuan, named Ping, was of Chu's royal clan. He served as Chu King Huai's left aide. Broad in learning and strong in will, clear on order and chaos, skilled in rhetoric. When in court he consulted with the king on state affairs and issued commands; When abroad he received guests and responded to feudal lords. The king relied on him greatly.

sentences.zh: 上官大夫與之同列，爭寵而心害其能。

translations.text: The Grand Chamberlain shared his rank, competed for favor and secretly envied his talent.

sentences.zh: 懷王使屈原造為憲令，屈平屬草槁未定。

translations.text: King Huai ordered Qu Yuan to draft the constitution. Qu Ping had just finished the rough draft.

sentences.zh: 上官大夫見而欲奪之，屈平不與，因讒之曰：「王使屈平為令，眾莫不知，每一令出，平伐其功，（曰）以為『非我莫能為』也。」

translations.text: The Grand Chamberlain saw it and wanted to steal it. Qu Ping would not give it. Thus he slandered saying: 'The king ordered Qu Ping to draft the constitution. Everyone knows this. Every time a command is issued, Ping claims the credit, saying "Only I could do this."'

sentences.zh: 王怒而疏屈平。

translations.text: The king grew angry and distanced Qu Ping.

The Grand Chamberlain shared his rank, competed for favor and secretly envied his talent. King Huai ordered Qu Yuan to draft the constitution. Qu Ping had just finished the rough draft. The Grand Chamberlain saw it and wanted to steal it. Qu Ping would not give it. Thus he slandered saying: 'The king ordered Qu Ping to draft the constitution. Everyone knows this. Every time a command is issued, Ping claims the credit, saying "Only I could do this."' The king grew angry and distanced Qu Ping.

sentences.zh: 屈平疾王聽之不聰也，讒諂之蔽明也，邪曲之害公也，方正之不容也，故憂愁幽思而作離騷。

translations.text: Qu Ping resented that the king listened without wisdom, that slanderers blocked clarity, that crookedness harmed justice, that uprightness was not tolerated. Thus he worried and brooded in sorrow and composed 'Li Sao'.

sentences.zh: 離騷者，猶離憂也。

translations.text: 'Li Sao' means departing sorrow.

sentences.zh: 夫天者，人之始也；

translations.text: Heaven is the beginning of man;

sentences.zh: 父母者，人之本也。

translations.text: Parents are man's foundation.

sentences.zh: 人窮則反本，故勞苦倦極，未嘗不呼天也；

translations.text: When man is in distress he returns to fundamentals, thus when exhausted by toil and weariness, one inevitably cries to heaven;

sentences.zh: 疾痛慘怛，未嘗不呼父母也。

translations.text: When pained by illness and suffering, one inevitably cries to parents.

sentences.zh: 屈平正道直行，竭忠盡智以事其君，讒人閒之，可謂窮矣。

translations.text: Qu Ping walked the straight path, exhausted loyalty and wisdom serving his lord. Slanderers came between them - he can be called destitute.

sentences.zh: 信而見疑，忠而被謗，能無怨乎？

translations.text: Trusted yet suspected, loyal yet slandered - how could he not resent?

sentences.zh: 屈平之作離騷，蓋自怨生也。

translations.text: Qu Ping's composition of 'Li Sao' arose from self-pity.

sentences.zh: 國風好色而不淫，小雅怨誹而不亂。

translations.text: 'Guo Feng' delights in beauty without licentiousness, 'Xiao Ya' resents and satirizes without disorder.

sentences.zh: 若離騷者，可謂兼之矣。

translations.text: As for 'Li Sao', it can be said to combine both.

sentences.zh: 上稱帝嚳，下道齊桓，中述湯武，以刺世事。

translations.text: Above it praises Emperor Ku, below it describes Duke Huan of Qi, in the middle it narrates Tang and Wu, to criticize contemporary affairs.

sentences.zh: 明道德之廣崇，治亂之條貫，靡不畢見。

translations.text: It illuminates the vast sublimity of morality, the systematic principles of order and chaos - nothing is not fully revealed.

sentences.zh: 其文約，其辭微，其志絜，其行廉，其稱文小而其指極大，舉類邇而見義遠。

translations.text: Its text is concise, its diction subtle, its ambition pure, its conduct honest. Its language is modest but its meaning extremely grand, citing near examples yet revealing far-reaching principles.

sentences.zh: 其志絜，故其稱物芳。

translations.text: Its ambition pure, thus it praises fragrant things.

sentences.zh: 其行廉，故死而不容自疏。

translations.text: Its conduct honest, thus in death it would not let itself be distant.

sentences.zh: 濯淖汙泥之中，蟬蛻於濁穢，以浮游塵埃之外，不獲世之滋垢，皭然泥而不滓者也。

translations.text: Washing in filthy mud, shedding like a cicada from impurity, to float and roam beyond the dust, not acquiring the world's defilement, pure white mud yet unstained.

sentences.zh: 推此志也，雖與日月爭光可也。

translations.text: Extending this ambition, even contending with sun and moon for brilliance is possible.

Qu Ping resented that the king listened without wisdom, that slanderers blocked clarity, that crookedness harmed justice, that uprightness was not tolerated. Thus he worried and brooded in sorrow and composed 'Li Sao'. 'Li Sao' means departing sorrow. Heaven is the beginning of man; Parents are man's foundation. When man is in distress he returns to fundamentals, thus when exhausted by toil and weariness, one inevitably cries to heaven; When pained by illness and suffering, one inevitably cries to parents. Qu Ping walked the straight path, exhausted loyalty and wisdom serving his lord. Slanderers came between them - he can be called destitute. Trusted yet suspected, loyal yet slandered - how could he not resent? Qu Ping's composition of 'Li Sao' arose from self-pity. 'Guo Feng' delights in beauty without licentiousness, 'Xiao Ya' resents and satirizes without disorder. As for 'Li Sao', it can be said to combine both. Above it praises Emperor Ku, below it describes Duke Huan of Qi, in the middle it narrates Tang and Wu, to criticize contemporary affairs. It illuminates the vast sublimity of morality, the systematic principles of order and chaos - nothing is not fully revealed. Its text is concise, its diction subtle, its ambition pure, its conduct honest. Its language is modest but its meaning extremely grand, citing near examples yet revealing far-reaching principles. Its ambition pure, thus it praises fragrant things. Its conduct honest, thus in death it would not let itself be distant. Washing in filthy mud, shedding like a cicada from impurity, to float and roam beyond the dust, not acquiring the world's defilement, pure white mud yet unstained. Extending this ambition, even contending with sun and moon for brilliance is possible.

sentences.zh: 屈平既絀，其後秦欲伐齊，齊與楚從親，惠王患之，乃令張儀詳去秦，厚幣委質事楚，曰：「秦甚憎齊，齊與楚從親，楚誠能絕齊，秦願獻商、於之地六百里。」

translations.text: Qu Ping having been demoted, afterward Qin wanted to attack Qi. Qi and Chu had allied closely. Qin King Hui worried, thus ordered Zhang Yi to pretend to leave Qin, offer rich gifts and serve Chu, saying: 'Qin greatly hates Qi. Qi and Chu have allied closely. If Chu can truly break with Qi, Qin wishes to offer the lands of Shang and Yu, six hundred li.'

sentences.zh: 楚懷王貪而信張儀，遂絕齊，使使如秦受地。

translations.text: Chu King Huai, greedy, believed Zhang Yi, thus broke with Qi and sent envoys to Qin to receive land.

sentences.zh: 張儀詐之曰：「儀與王約六里，不聞六百里。」

translations.text: Zhang Yi deceived saying: 'Yi and the king agreed to six li, not six hundred li.'

sentences.zh: 楚使怒去，歸告懷王。

translations.text: The Chu envoy angrily left, returned and reported to King Huai.

sentences.zh: 懷王怒，大興師伐秦。

translations.text: King Huai angered, greatly raised troops to attack Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦發兵擊之，大破楚師於丹、淅，斬首八萬，虜楚將屈丐，遂取楚之漢中地。

translations.text: Qin sent troops to strike them, greatly defeated Chu army at Dan and Xi, beheaded eighty thousand, captured Chu general Qu Gai, thus took Chu's Han River region.

sentences.zh: 懷王乃悉發國中兵以深入擊秦，戰於藍田。

translations.text: King Huai then mobilized all troops in the state for deep invasion to attack Qin, battled at Lan Tian.

sentences.zh: 魏聞之，襲楚至鄧。

translations.text: Wei heard of it, raided Chu to Deng.

sentences.zh: 楚兵懼，自秦歸。

translations.text: Chu troops feared, returned from Qin.

sentences.zh: 而齊竟怒不救楚，楚大困。

translations.text: Yet Qi ultimately angered and did not rescue Chu, Chu greatly distressed.

Qu Ping having been demoted, afterward Qin wanted to attack Qi. Qi and Chu had allied closely. Qin King Hui worried, thus ordered Zhang Yi to pretend to leave Qin, offer rich gifts and serve Chu, saying: 'Qin greatly hates Qi. Qi and Chu have allied closely. If Chu can truly break with Qi, Qin wishes to offer the lands of Shang and Yu, six hundred li.' Chu King Huai, greedy, believed Zhang Yi, thus broke with Qi and sent envoys to Qin to receive land. Zhang Yi deceived saying: 'Yi and the king agreed to six li, not six hundred li.' The Chu envoy angrily left, returned and reported to King Huai. King Huai angered, greatly raised troops to attack Qin. Qin sent troops to strike them, greatly defeated Chu army at Dan and Xi, beheaded eighty thousand, captured Chu general Qu Gai, thus took Chu's Han River region. King Huai then mobilized all troops in the state for deep invasion to attack Qin, battled at Lan Tian. Wei heard of it, raided Chu to Deng. Chu troops feared, returned from Qin. Yet Qi ultimately angered and did not rescue Chu, Chu greatly distressed.

sentences.zh: 明年，秦割漢中地與楚以和。

translations.text: Next year, Qin ceded Han River region to Chu for peace.

sentences.zh: 楚王曰：「不願得地，願得張儀而甘心焉。」

translations.text: Chu king said: 'I do not wish land, I wish Zhang Yi to satisfy my hatred.'

sentences.zh: 張儀聞，乃曰：「以一儀而當漢中地，臣請往如楚。」

translations.text: Zhang Yi heard, thus said: 'Using one Yi to exchange for Han River region, minister requests to go to Chu.'

sentences.zh: 如楚，又因厚幣用事者臣靳尚，而設詭辯於懷王之寵姬鄭袖。

translations.text: Went to Chu, again used rich gifts to make the influential minister Jin Shang serve him, and set deceptive arguments through King Huai's favored concubine Zheng Xiu.

sentences.zh: 懷王竟聽鄭袖，復釋去張儀。

translations.text: King Huai ultimately listened to Zheng Xiu, again released Zhang Yi.

sentences.zh: 是時屈平既疏，不復在位，使於齊，顧反，諫懷王曰：「何不殺張儀？」

translations.text: At this time Qu Ping was already estranged, no longer in position. Sent to Qi, on return advised King Huai: 'Why not kill Zhang Yi?'

sentences.zh: 懷王悔，追張儀不及。

translations.text: King Huai regretted, pursued Zhang Yi but could not catch him.

Next year, Qin ceded Han River region to Chu for peace. Chu king said: 'I do not wish land, I wish Zhang Yi to satisfy my hatred.' Zhang Yi heard, thus said: 'Using one Yi to exchange for Han River region, minister requests to go to Chu.' Went to Chu, again used rich gifts to make the influential minister Jin Shang serve him, and set deceptive arguments through King Huai's favored concubine Zheng Xiu. King Huai ultimately listened to Zheng Xiu, again released Zhang Yi. At this time Qu Ping was already estranged, no longer in position. Sent to Qi, on return advised King Huai: 'Why not kill Zhang Yi?' King Huai regretted, pursued Zhang Yi but could not catch him.

sentences.zh: 其後諸侯共擊楚，大破之，殺其將唐眛。

translations.text: Afterward the feudal lords together attacked Chu, greatly defeated them, killed their general Tang Mei.
Afterward the feudal lords together attacked Chu, greatly defeated them, killed their general Tang Mei.

sentences.zh: 時秦昭王與楚婚，欲與懷王會。

translations.text: At this time Qin King Zhao married into Chu, wished to meet with King Huai.

sentences.zh: 懷王欲行，屈平曰：「秦虎狼之國，不可信，不如毋行。」

translations.text: King Huai wished to go. Qu Ping said: 'Qin is a tiger wolf state, cannot be trusted, better not to go.'

sentences.zh: 懷王稚子子蘭勸王行：「柰何絕秦歡！」

translations.text: King Huai's young son Zi Lan urged the king to go: 'How can we cut off Qin's goodwill!'

sentences.zh: 懷王卒行。

translations.text: King Huai ultimately went.

sentences.zh: 入武關，秦伏兵絕其後，因留懷王，以求割地。

translations.text: Entered Wu Pass, Qin ambushed troops cut off his rear, thus detained King Huai to demand territory cession.

sentences.zh: 懷王怒，不聽。

translations.text: King Huai angered, would not listen.

sentences.zh: 亡走趙，趙不內。

translations.text: Fled to Zhao, Zhao would not admit him.

sentences.zh: 復之秦，竟死於秦而歸葬。

translations.text: Returned to Qin, ultimately died in Qin and was returned for burial.

At this time Qin King Zhao married into Chu, wished to meet with King Huai. King Huai wished to go. Qu Ping said: 'Qin is a tiger wolf state, cannot be trusted, better not to go.' King Huai's young son Zi Lan urged the king to go: 'How can we cut off Qin's goodwill!' King Huai ultimately went. Entered Wu Pass, Qin ambushed troops cut off his rear, thus detained King Huai to demand territory cession. King Huai angered, would not listen. Fled to Zhao, Zhao would not admit him. Returned to Qin, ultimately died in Qin and was returned for burial.

sentences.zh: 長子頃襄王立，以其弟子蘭為令尹。

translations.text: Eldest son King Qingxiang ascended, made his younger brother Zi Lan prime minister.

sentences.zh: 楚人既咎子蘭以勸懷王入秦而不反也。

translations.text: Chu people already blamed Zi Lan for urging King Huai to enter Qin without return.
Eldest son King Qingxiang ascended, made his younger brother Zi Lan prime minister. Chu people already blamed Zi Lan for urging King Huai to enter Qin without return.

sentences.zh: 屈平既嫉之，雖放流，睠顧楚國，系心懷王，不忘欲反，冀幸君之一悟，俗之一改也。

translations.text: Qu Ping having envied this, though banished, gazed back at Chu state, heart attached to King Huai, not forgetting desire to return, hoping the lord would one day awaken, customs would one day change.

sentences.zh: 其存君興國而欲反覆之，一篇之中三致志焉。

translations.text: His preserving the lord and reviving the state while wishing to overturn them - in one poem three times expressing this ambition.

sentences.zh: 然終無可柰何，故不可以反，卒以此見懷王之終不悟也。

translations.text: Yet ultimately nothing could be done, thus could not return, finally showed King Huai's final lack of awakening.

sentences.zh: 人君無愚智賢不肖，莫不欲求忠以自為，舉賢以自佐，然亡國破家相隨屬，而聖君治國累世而不見者，其所謂忠者不忠，而所謂賢者不賢也。

translations.text: Rulers, whether foolish or wise, worthy or unworthy, all wish to seek loyalty for themselves, promote worthies to assist themselves. Yet ruined states and broken families follow one after another, while sage lords govern states for generations without being seen. What they call loyal is not loyal, what they call worthy is not worthy.

sentences.zh: 懷王以不知忠臣之分，故內惑於鄭袖，外欺於張儀，疏屈平而信上官大夫、令尹子蘭。

translations.text: King Huai because he did not know the distinction of loyal ministers, thus internally deluded by Zheng Xiu, externally deceived by Zhang Yi, distanced Qu Ping while trusting Grand Chamberlain and Prime Minister Zi Lan.

sentences.zh: 兵挫地削，亡其六郡，身客死於秦，為天下笑。

translations.text: Troops defeated territory reduced, lost six commanderies, person died as guest in Qin, became world's laughter.

sentences.zh: 此不知人之禍也。

translations.text: This is the calamity of not knowing people.

sentences.zh: 《易》曰：「井泄不食，為我心惻，可以汲。

translations.text: 'Yi' says: 'Well leaks not drunk, makes my heart sorrowful, can draw water.

sentences.zh: 王明，并受其福。」

translations.text: King enlightened, all receive its blessing.'

sentences.zh: 王之不明，豈足福哉！

translations.text: The king's lack of enlightenment, how can it bring blessing!

Qu Ping having envied this, though banished, gazed back at Chu state, heart attached to King Huai, not forgetting desire to return, hoping the lord would one day awaken, customs would one day change. His preserving the lord and reviving the state while wishing to overturn them - in one poem three times expressing this ambition. Yet ultimately nothing could be done, thus could not return, finally showed King Huai's final lack of awakening. Rulers, whether foolish or wise, worthy or unworthy, all wish to seek loyalty for themselves, promote worthies to assist themselves. Yet ruined states and broken families follow one after another, while sage lords govern states for generations without being seen. What they call loyal is not loyal, what they call worthy is not worthy. King Huai because he did not know the distinction of loyal ministers, thus internally deluded by Zheng Xiu, externally deceived by Zhang Yi, distanced Qu Ping while trusting Grand Chamberlain and Prime Minister Zi Lan. Troops defeated territory reduced, lost six commanderies, person died as guest in Qin, became world's laughter. This is the calamity of not knowing people. 'Yi' says: 'Well leaks not drunk, makes my heart sorrowful, can draw water. King enlightened, all receive its blessing.' The king's lack of enlightenment, how can it bring blessing!

sentences.zh: 令尹子蘭聞之大怒，卒使上官大夫短屈原於頃襄王，頃襄王怒而遷之。

translations.text: Prime Minister Zi Lan heard of it greatly angered, ultimately had Grand Chamberlain slander Qu Yuan to King Qingxiang. King Qingxiang angered and banished him.
Prime Minister Zi Lan heard of it greatly angered, ultimately had Grand Chamberlain slander Qu Yuan to King Qingxiang. King Qingxiang angered and banished him.

sentences.zh: 屈原至於江濱，被髪行吟澤畔。

translations.text: Qu Yuan reached the Jiang River shore, disheveled wandering reciting by the marsh.

sentences.zh: 顏色憔悴，形容枯槁。

translations.text: Complexion haggard, form withered.

sentences.zh: 漁父見而問之曰：「子非三閭大夫歟？

translations.text: Fisherman saw and asked him: 'Are you not the San Lu official?

sentences.zh: 何故而至此？」

translations.text: Why have you come to this?'

sentences.zh: 屈原曰：「舉世混濁而我獨清，眾人皆醉而我獨醒，是以見放。」

translations.text: Qu Yuan said: 'The whole world is muddy yet I alone am clear, everyone is drunk yet I alone am sober, thus I am banished.'

sentences.zh: 漁父曰：「夫聖人者，不凝滯於物而能與世推移。

translations.text: Fisherman said: 'Sages do not congeal in things and can shift with the age.

sentences.zh: 舉世混濁，何不隨其流而揚其波？

translations.text: Whole world muddy, why not follow the current and raise its waves?

sentences.zh: 眾人皆醉，何不餔其糟而啜其醨？

translations.text: Everyone drunk, why not drink the dregs and sip the thin wine?

sentences.zh: 何故懷瑾握瑜而自令見放為？」

translations.text: Why embrace jade and hold pearl yet make yourself banished?'

sentences.zh: 屈原曰：「吾聞之，新沐者必彈冠，新浴者必振衣，人又誰能以身之察察，受物之汶汶者乎！

translations.text: Qu Yuan said: 'I have heard, newly washed must dust the cap, newly bathed must shake the clothes. Moreover who can with body's purity receive things' defilement?

sentences.zh: 寧赴常流而葬乎江魚腹中耳，又安能以皓皓之白而蒙世俗之溫蠖乎！」

translations.text: Rather enter the constant current and be buried in the Jiang fish belly, how can I with gleaming white submit to the world's dust and filth!'

Qu Yuan reached the Jiang River shore, disheveled wandering reciting by the marsh. Complexion haggard, form withered. Fisherman saw and asked him: 'Are you not the San Lu official? Why have you come to this?' Qu Yuan said: 'The whole world is muddy yet I alone am clear, everyone is drunk yet I alone am sober, thus I am banished.' Fisherman said: 'Sages do not congeal in things and can shift with the age. Whole world muddy, why not follow the current and raise its waves? Everyone drunk, why not drink the dregs and sip the thin wine? Why embrace jade and hold pearl yet make yourself banished?' Qu Yuan said: 'I have heard, newly washed must dust the cap, newly bathed must shake the clothes. Moreover who can with body's purity receive things' defilement? Rather enter the constant current and be buried in the Jiang fish belly, how can I with gleaming white submit to the world's dust and filth!'

sentences.zh: 乃作懷沙之賦。

translations.text: Thus composed 'Huai Sha' rhapsody.

sentences.zh: 其辭曰：

translations.text: Its words say:
Thus composed 'Huai Sha' rhapsody. Its words say:

sentences.zh: 陶陶孟夏兮，草木莽莽。

translations.text: Bright fifth month, plants and trees dense.

sentences.zh: 傷懷永哀兮，汩徂南土。

translations.text: Wounded heart eternal sorrow, hastening to southern lands.

sentences.zh: 眴兮窈窈，孔靜幽墨。

translations.text: Gazing deep dark, extremely quiet secluded dark.

sentences.zh: 冤結紆軫兮，離愍之長鞠；

translations.text: Grievance knotted twisting pained, sorrow's long suffering;

sentences.zh: 撫情效志兮，俛詘以自抑。

translations.text: Caressing feelings examining ambition, bending to restrain oneself.

Bright fifth month, plants and trees dense. Wounded heart eternal sorrow, hastening to southern lands. Gazing deep dark, extremely quiet secluded dark. Grievance knotted twisting pained, sorrow's long suffering; Caressing feelings examining ambition, bending to restrain oneself.

sentences.zh: 刓方以為圜兮，常度未替；

translations.text: Rounding square to make round, constant measure unchanged;

sentences.zh: 易初本由兮，君子所鄙。

translations.text: Changing beginning following precedent, gentleman despises.

sentences.zh: 章畫職墨兮，前度未改；

translations.text: Pattern drawing using ink, previous measure unchanged;

sentences.zh: 內直質重兮，大人所盛。

translations.text: Inner straight substantial heavy, great man values.

sentences.zh: 巧匠不斲兮，孰察其揆正？

translations.text: Skilled artisan not hews, who examines its standard correctness?

sentences.zh: 玄文幽處兮，矇謂之不章；

translations.text: Dark patterns hidden place, blind calls it not bright;

sentences.zh: 離婁微睇兮，瞽以為無明。

translations.text: Li Lou subtle gaze, blind considers it no sight.

sentences.zh: 變白而為黑兮，倒上以為下。

translations.text: Changing white to black, inverting top to bottom.

sentences.zh: 鳳皇在笯兮，雞雉翔舞。

translations.text: Phoenix in cage, chickens fly dance.

sentences.zh: 同糅玉石兮，一而相量。

translations.text: Mixing jade stone together, same yet compared.

sentences.zh: 夫黨人之鄙妒兮，羌不知吾所臧。

translations.text: Faction men's base jealousy, utterly unknown my treasure.

Rounding square to make round, constant measure unchanged; Changing beginning following precedent, gentleman despises. Pattern drawing using ink, previous measure unchanged; Inner straight substantial heavy, great man values. Skilled artisan not hews, who examines its standard correctness? Dark patterns hidden place, blind calls it not bright; Li Lou subtle gaze, blind considers it no sight. Changing white to black, inverting top to bottom. Phoenix in cage, chickens fly dance. Mixing jade stone together, same yet compared. Faction men's base jealousy, utterly unknown my treasure.

sentences.zh: 任重載盛兮，陷滯而不濟；

translations.text: Bearing heavy carrying full, sinking stuck not crossing;

sentences.zh: 懷瑾握瑜兮，窮不得余所示。

translations.text: Embracing jade holding pearl, destitute cannot show to others.

sentences.zh: 邑犬群吠兮，吠所怪也；

translations.text: City dogs pack barking, barking what they consider strange;

sentences.zh: 誹駿疑桀兮，固庸態也。

translations.text: Slandering steeds doubting Jie, originally common attitude.

sentences.zh: 文質疏內兮，眾不知吾之異采；

translations.text: Literary quality sparse inner, crowd unknown my different colors;

sentences.zh: 材樸委積兮，莫知余之所有。

translations.text: Talents unhewn accumulated, none know my possessions.

sentences.zh: 重仁襲義兮，謹厚以為豐；

translations.text: Repeated benevolence repeated righteousness, careful substantial as abundance;

sentences.zh: 重華不可牾兮，孰知余之從容！

translations.text: Repeated Hua cannot oppose, who knows my ease!

sentences.zh: 迸固有不并兮，豈知其故也？

translations.text: Banished firmly not together, how know its reason?

sentences.zh: 湯禹久遠兮，邈不可慕也。

translations.text: Tang Yu long distant, far cannot admire.

sentences.zh: 懲違改忿兮，抑心而自彊；

translations.text: Punished violation changed anger, suppressed heart self-strengthened;

sentences.zh: 離湣而不遷兮，願志之有象。

translations.text: Departed sorrow not moved, wished ambition have model.

sentences.zh: 進路北次兮，日昧昧其將暮；

translations.text: Advanced road north lodged, day dim dim will evening;

sentences.zh: 含憂虞哀兮，限之以大故。

sentences.zh: 亂曰：浩浩沅、湘兮，分流汨兮。

translations.text: Chaos says: Vast Yuan Xiang, divided flow Mi.

sentences.zh: 修路幽拂兮，道遠忽兮。

translations.text: Long road secluded brushed, way far sudden.

sentences.zh: 曾唫恒悲兮，永嘆慨兮。

translations.text: Layer sighed constant sorrow, eternal sighed grieved.

sentences.zh: 世既莫吾知兮，人心不可謂兮。

translations.text: Age already none know me, human heart cannot speak.

sentences.zh: 懷情抱質兮，獨無匹兮。

translations.text: Embrace feelings hold quality, alone without match.

sentences.zh: 伯樂既歿兮，驥將焉程兮？

translations.text: Bo Le already dead, steed where appraise?

sentences.zh: 人生稟命兮，各有所錯兮。

translations.text: Human life receives fate, each has placement.

sentences.zh: 定心廣志，餘何畏懼兮？

translations.text: Fixed heart broad ambition, I what fear?

sentences.zh: 曾傷爰哀，永嘆喟兮。

translations.text: Layer injured loved sorrow, eternal sighed grieved.

sentences.zh: 世溷不吾知，心不可謂兮。

translations.text: Age muddy not know me, heart cannot speak.

sentences.zh: 知死不可讓兮，願勿愛兮。

translations.text: Know death cannot yield, wish not cherish.

sentences.zh: 明以告君子兮，吾將以為類兮。

translations.text: Clearly tell gentleman, I will take as example.

sentences.zh: 於是懷石遂自（投）［沈］汨羅以死。

translations.text: Thus embracing stone self-drowned Mi Luo to die.
Thus embracing stone self-drowned Mi Luo to die.

sentences.zh: 屈原既死之後，楚有宋玉、唐勒、景差之徒者，皆好辭而以賦見稱；

translations.text: Qu Yuan having died after, Chu had Song Yu, Tang Le, Jing Chai and others, all good at rhetoric and famous for rhapsodies;

sentences.zh: 然皆祖屈原之從容辭令，終莫敢直諫。

translations.text: Yet all followed Qu Yuan's ease and rhetoric, ultimately dared not directly remonstrate.

sentences.zh: 其後楚日以削，數十年竟為秦所滅。

translations.text: Afterward Chu daily diminished, several decades ultimately destroyed by Qin.

Qu Yuan having died after, Chu had Song Yu, Tang Le, Jing Chai and others, all good at rhetoric and famous for rhapsodies; Yet all followed Qu Yuan's ease and rhetoric, ultimately dared not directly remonstrate. Afterward Chu daily diminished, several decades ultimately destroyed by Qin.

sentences.zh: 自屈原沈汨羅後百有餘年，漢有賈生，為長沙王太傅，過湘水，投書以弔屈原。

translations.text: From Qu Yuan drowning Mi Luo after hundred plus years, Han had Jia Sheng, as Changsha King tutor, passed Xiang water, cast letter to mourn Qu Yuan.
From Qu Yuan drowning Mi Luo after hundred plus years, Han had Jia Sheng, as Changsha King tutor, passed Xiang water, cast letter to mourn Qu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 賈生名誼，雒陽人也。

translations.text: Jia Sheng named Yi, Luoyang person.

sentences.zh: 年十八，以能誦詩屬書聞於郡中。

translations.text: Age eighteen, with ability to recite poetry and books famous in commandery.

sentences.zh: 吳廷尉為河南守，聞其秀才，召置門下，甚幸愛。

translations.text: Wu Court Scribe as Henan governor, heard his outstanding talent, summoned to place under gate, greatly favored loved.

sentences.zh: 孝文皇帝初立，聞河南守吳公治平為天下第一，故與李斯同邑而常學事焉，乃徵為廷尉。

translations.text: Filial Wen emperor initially ascended, heard Henan governor Wu Gong governed peacefully as world first, thus with Li Si same district and often studied affairs from him, thus summoned as Court Scribe.

sentences.zh: 廷尉乃言賈生年少，頗通諸子百家之書。

translations.text: Court Scribe then spoke Jia Sheng young, quite versed in hundred schools books.

sentences.zh: 文帝召以為博士。

translations.text: Wen emperor summoned as erudite.

Jia Sheng named Yi, Luoyang person. Age eighteen, with ability to recite poetry and books famous in commandery. Wu Court Scribe as Henan governor, heard his outstanding talent, summoned to place under gate, greatly favored loved. Filial Wen emperor initially ascended, heard Henan governor Wu Gong governed peacefully as world first, thus with Li Si same district and often studied affairs from him, thus summoned as Court Scribe. Court Scribe then spoke Jia Sheng young, quite versed in hundred schools books. Wen emperor summoned as erudite.

sentences.zh: 是時賈生年二十餘，最為少。

translations.text: At this time Jia Sheng age twenty plus, was youngest.

sentences.zh: 每詔令議下，諸老先生不能言，賈生盡為之對，人人各如其意所欲出。

translations.text: Every time edicts and commands issued for discussion, various old masters could not speak, Jia Sheng completely responded to them, each person as their intent desired.

sentences.zh: 諸生於是乃以為能，不及也。

translations.text: Various scholars then considered him able, could not match.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝說之，超遷，一歲中至太中大夫。

translations.text: Filial Wen emperor pleased, promoted extraordinarily, one year to Grand Palace Grandee.

At this time Jia Sheng age twenty plus, was youngest. Every time edicts and commands issued for discussion, various old masters could not speak, Jia Sheng completely responded to them, each person as their intent desired. Various scholars then considered him able, could not match. Filial Wen emperor pleased, promoted extraordinarily, one year to Grand Palace Grandee.

sentences.zh: 賈生以為漢興至孝文二十餘年，天下和洽，而固當改正朔，易服色，法制度，定官名，興禮樂，乃悉草具其事儀法，色尚黃，數用五，為官名，悉更秦之法。

translations.text: Jia Sheng considered Han rise to Filial Wen twenty plus years, world peaceful harmonious, yet should correct calendar, change clothing colors, establish laws systems, determine official names, promote rites music. Thus completely drafted all affair ceremonies laws, color honored yellow, number used five, for official names, completely changed Qin's laws.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝初即位，謙讓未遑也。

translations.text: Filial Wen emperor initially ascended, modest yielding not yet had time.

sentences.zh: 諸律令所更定，及列侯悉就國，其說皆自賈生發之。

translations.text: Various statutes commands newly determined, and marquises all went to fiefs, these theories all originated from Jia Sheng.

sentences.zh: 於是天子議以為賈生任公卿之位。

translations.text: Thus Son of Heaven discussed appointing Jia Sheng to duke minister position.

sentences.zh: 絳、灌、東陽侯、馮敬之屬盡害之，乃短賈生曰：「雒陽之人，年少初學，專欲擅權，紛亂諸事。」

translations.text: Jiang, Guan, Dongyang Marquis, Feng Jing and others all harmed him, thus slandered Jia Sheng saying: 'Luoyang person, young beginner scholar, specially wishes to monopolize power, disorder various affairs.'

sentences.zh: 於是天子後亦疏之，不用其議，乃以賈生為長沙王太傅。

translations.text: Thus Son of Heaven afterward also distanced him, did not use his proposals, appointed Jia Sheng as Changsha King tutor.

Jia Sheng considered Han rise to Filial Wen twenty plus years, world peaceful harmonious, yet should correct calendar, change clothing colors, establish laws systems, determine official names, promote rites music. Thus completely drafted all affair ceremonies laws, color honored yellow, number used five, for official names, completely changed Qin's laws. Filial Wen emperor initially ascended, modest yielding not yet had time. Various statutes commands newly determined, and marquises all went to fiefs, these theories all originated from Jia Sheng. Thus Son of Heaven discussed appointing Jia Sheng to duke minister position. Jiang, Guan, Dongyang Marquis, Feng Jing and others all harmed him, thus slandered Jia Sheng saying: 'Luoyang person, young beginner scholar, specially wishes to monopolize power, disorder various affairs.' Thus Son of Heaven afterward also distanced him, did not use his proposals, appointed Jia Sheng as Changsha King tutor.

sentences.zh: 賈生既辭往行，聞長沙卑溼，自以壽不得長，又以適去，意不自得。

translations.text: Jia Sheng having declined went traveling, heard Changsha low wet, self-considered lifespan could not be long, moreover departing capital, intent not self-satisfied.

sentences.zh: 及渡湘水，為賦以弔屈原。

translations.text: When crossing Xiang water, composed rhapsody to mourn Qu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 其辭曰：

translations.text: Its words say:

Jia Sheng having declined went traveling, heard Changsha low wet, self-considered lifespan could not be long, moreover departing capital, intent not self-satisfied. When crossing Xiang water, composed rhapsody to mourn Qu Yuan. Its words say:

sentences.zh: 共承嘉惠兮，俟罪長沙。

translations.text: Together receive fine favor, await guilt Changsha.

sentences.zh: 側聞屈原兮，自沈汨羅。

translations.text: Side heard Qu Yuan, self-drowned Mi Luo.

sentences.zh: 造託湘流兮，敬弔先生。

translations.text: Made entrusted Xiang current, respectfully mourn master.

sentences.zh: 遭世罔極兮，乃隕厥身。

translations.text: Encountered age without extreme, thus fell his person.

sentences.zh: 嗚呼哀哉，逢時不祥！

translations.text: Alas sorrowful, encountered age inauspicious!

sentences.zh: 鸞鳳伏竄兮，鴟梟翺翔：闒茸尊顯兮，讒諛得志；

translations.text: Luan phoenix crouch hide, owl kite soar fly: despicable honored eminent, slanders obtain ambition;

sentences.zh: 賢聖逆曳兮，方正倒植。

translations.text: Worthy sages dragged backward, upright overturned planted.

sentences.zh: 世謂伯夷貪兮，謂盜跖廉；

translations.text: Age calls Bo Yi greedy, calls Dao Zhi honest;

sentences.zh: 莫邪為頓兮，鉛刀為铦。

translations.text: Mo Ye made blunt, lead knife made sharp.

sentences.zh: 于嗟嚜嚜兮，生之無故！

translations.text: Alas dark dark, life without reason!

sentences.zh: 斡棄周鼎兮寶康瓠，騰駕罷牛兮驂蹇驢，驥垂兩耳兮服鹽車。

translations.text: Turned abandoned Zhou tripod treasured marrow gourd, galloped drove exhausted ox hitched lame donkey, steed drooped two ears harnessed salt cart.

sentences.zh: 章甫薦屨兮，漸不可久；

translations.text: Ceremonial cap recommended shoes, gradually cannot last;

sentences.zh: 嗟苦先生兮，獨離此咎！

translations.text: Alas bitter master, alone separate this blame!

Together receive fine favor, await guilt Changsha. Side heard Qu Yuan, self-drowned Mi Luo. Made entrusted Xiang current, respectfully mourn master. Ceremonial cap recommended shoes, gradually cannot last; Alas bitter master, alone separate this blame!

sentences.zh: 訊曰：已矣，國其莫我知，獨堙郁兮其誰語？

translations.text: Message says: Finished, state none know me, alone stifled depressed who speak?

sentences.zh: 鳳漂漂其高遰兮，夫固自縮而遠去。

translations.text: Phoenix drifting high far, indeed self-shrink far go.

sentences.zh: 襲九淵之神龍兮，沕深潛以自珍。

translations.text: Follow nine abysses divine dragon, deep submerged self-treasure.

sentences.zh: 彌融爚以隱處兮，夫豈從螘與蛭螾？

translations.text: Profoundly hidden concealed place, how follow ants leeches?

sentences.zh: 所貴聖人之神德兮，遠濁世而自藏。

translations.text: Valued sages divine virtue, far muddy age self-hide.

sentences.zh: 使騏驥可得系羈兮，豈云異夫犬羊！

translations.text: Make qi ji can obtain tied restrained, how different from dogs sheep!

sentences.zh: 般紛紛其離此尤兮，亦夫子之辜也！

translations.text: Various confused depart this fault, also master's guilt!

sentences.zh: 瞝九州而相君兮，何必懷此都也？

translations.text: Look nine provinces mutually lord, why must cherish this capital?

sentences.zh: 鳳皇翔于千仞之上兮，覽德惪而下之；

translations.text: Phoenix soars thousand ren above, views virtue solid descend;

sentences.zh: 見細德之險（微）［徵］兮，搖增翮逝而去之。

translations.text: Sees petty virtue dangerous signs, shakes increased feathers departed gone.

sentences.zh: 彼尋常之汙瀆兮，豈能容吞舟之魚！

translations.text: That common filth ditch, how can contain swallow boat fish!

sentences.zh: 橫江湖之鱣鱏兮，固將制於蟻螻。

translations.text: Horizontal rivers lakes giant fish, indeed will controlled by ants mole crickets.

Message says: Finished, state none know me, alone stifled depressed who speak? Phoenix drifting high far, indeed self-shrink far go. Follow nine abysses divine dragon, deep submerged self-treasure. Profoundly hidden concealed place, how follow ants leeches? Valued sages divine virtue, far muddy age self-hide. Make qi ji can obtain tied restrained, how different from dogs sheep! Various confused depart this fault, also master's guilt! Look nine provinces mutually lord, why must cherish this capital? Horizontal rivers lakes giant fish, indeed will controlled by ants mole crickets.

sentences.zh: 賈生為長沙王太傅三年，有鸮飛入賈生舍，止于坐隅。

translations.text: Jia Sheng as Changsha King tutor three years, owl flew into Jia Sheng residence, stopped at seat corner.

sentences.zh: 楚人命鸮曰「服」。

translations.text: Chu people name owl 'fu'.

sentences.zh: 賈生既以適居長沙，長沙卑溼，自以為壽不得長，傷悼之，乃為賦以自廣。

translations.text: Jia Sheng since banished dwell Changsha, Changsha low wet, self-considered lifespan could not be long, injured mourned it, thus composed rhapsody self-consolation.

sentences.zh: 其辭曰：

translations.text: Its words say:

Jia Sheng as Changsha King tutor three years, owl flew into Jia Sheng residence, stopped at seat corner. Chu people name owl 'fu'. Jia Sheng since banished dwell Changsha, Changsha low wet, self-considered lifespan could not be long, injured mourned it, thus composed rhapsody self-consolation. Its words say:

sentences.zh: 單閼之歲兮，四月孟夏，庚子日施兮，服集予舍，止于坐隅，貌甚閒暇。

translations.text: Single gate year, fourth month first summer, geng zi day si, fu gathered my residence, stopped at seat corner, appearance very leisurely.

sentences.zh: 異物來集兮，私怪其故，發書占之兮，筴言其度。

translations.text: Strange thing come gathered, privately strange its reason, opened book divined it, tally spoke its measure.

sentences.zh: 曰「野鳥入處兮，主人將去」。

translations.text: Said 'wild bird enter dwelling, master will depart'.

sentences.zh: 請問于服兮：「予去何之？

translations.text: Request ask fu: 'I depart where go?

sentences.zh: 吉乎告我，凶言其菑。

translations.text: Auspicious tell me, inauspicious speak its calamity.

sentences.zh: 淹數之度兮，語予其期。」

translations.text: Dwell number measure, tell me its time.'

sentences.zh: 服乃嘆息，舉首奮翼，口不能言，請對以意。

translations.text: Fu then sighed, raised head shook wings, mouth cannot speak, requested respond with intention.

Single gate year, fourth month first summer, geng zi day si, fu gathered my residence, stopped at seat corner, appearance very leisurely. Strange thing come gathered, privately strange its reason, opened book divined it, tally spoke its measure. Said 'wild bird enter dwelling, master will depart'. Request ask fu: 'I depart where go? Auspicious tell me, inauspicious speak its calamity. Dwell number measure, tell me its time.' Fu then sighed, raised head shook wings, mouth cannot speak, requested respond with intention.

sentences.zh: 萬物變化兮，固無休息。

translations.text: Myriad things change, indeed no rest.

sentences.zh: 斡流而遷兮，或推而還。

translations.text: Turn flow migrate, or push return.

sentences.zh: 形氣轉續兮，變化而嬗。

translations.text: Form qi transfer continue, change transform.

sentences.zh: 沕穆無窮兮，胡可勝言！

translations.text: Profound silent no limit, how can exhaust speak!

sentences.zh: 禍兮福所倚，福兮禍所伏；

translations.text: Calamity fortune relies on, fortune calamity hides;

sentences.zh: 憂喜聚門兮，吉凶同域。

translations.text: Worry joy gather gate, auspicious inauspicious same domain.

sentences.zh: 彼吳彊大兮，夫差以敗；

translations.text: That Wu strong great, Fu Cha with defeat;

sentences.zh: 越棲會稽兮，句踐霸世。

translations.text: Yue dwelt Kui Ji, Gou Jian hegemon world.

sentences.zh: 斯游遂成兮，卒被五刑；

translations.text: Si You succeeded, finally suffered five punishments;

sentences.zh: 傅說胥靡兮，乃相武丁。

translations.text: Fu Yue slave labor, then ministered Wu Ding.

sentences.zh: 夫禍之與福兮，何異糾纆。

translations.text: Calamity and fortune, what different rope tangle.

sentences.zh: 命不可說兮，孰知其極？

translations.text: Fate cannot explain, who knows its extreme?

sentences.zh: 水激則旱兮，矢激則遠。

translations.text: Water shoots then dry, arrow shoots then far.

sentences.zh: 萬物回薄兮，振蕩相轉。

translations.text: Myriad things turn press, shake move mutually transfer.

sentences.zh: 雲蒸雨降兮，錯繆相紛。

translations.text: Cloud steams rain descends, wrong error mutually confused.

sentences.zh: 大專槃物兮，坱軋無垠。

translations.text: Great specialized turns things, vast presses no border.

sentences.zh: 天不可與慮兮，道不可與謀。

translations.text: Heaven cannot with deliberate, way cannot with plan.

sentences.zh: 遲數有命兮，惡識其時？

translations.text: Slow number has fate, evil know its time?

Myriad things change, indeed no rest. Turn flow migrate, or push return. Form qi transfer continue, change transform. Profound silent no limit, how can exhaust speak! Calamity fortune relies on, fortune calamity hides; Worry joy gather gate, auspicious inauspicious same domain. That Wu strong great, Fu Cha with defeat; Yue dwelt Kui Ji, Gou Jian hegemon world. Si You succeeded, finally suffered five punishments; Fu Yue slave labor, then ministered Wu Ding. Calamity and fortune, what different rope tangle. Fate cannot explain, who knows its extreme? Water shoots then dry, arrow shoots then far. Myriad things turn press, shake move mutually transfer. Cloud steams rain descends, wrong error mutually confused. Great specialized turns things, vast presses no border. Heaven cannot with deliberate, way cannot with plan. Slow number has fate, evil know its time?

sentences.zh: 且夫天地為鑪兮，造化為工；

translations.text: Moreover heaven earth as furnace, creation as artisan;

sentences.zh: 陰陽為炭兮，萬物為銅。

translations.text: Yin yang as charcoal, myriad things as copper.

sentences.zh: 合散消息兮，安有常則；

translations.text: Combine disperse wax wane, how have constant rule;

sentences.zh: 千變萬化兮，未始有極。

translations.text: Thousand changes ten thousand transformations, not begun have extreme.

sentences.zh: 忽然為人兮，何足控摶；

translations.text: Suddenly become human, what sufficient control grasp;

sentences.zh: 化為異物兮，又何足患！

translations.text: Transform become different thing, again what sufficient worry!

sentences.zh: 小知自私兮，賤彼貴我；

translations.text: Small knowledge self-private, belittle others value self;

sentences.zh: 通人大觀兮，物無不可。

translations.text: Greatly connected great view, things nothing cannot.

sentences.zh: 貪夫徇財兮，烈士徇名；

translations.text: Greedy man risk wealth, fierce scholars risk name;

sentences.zh: 夸者死權兮，品庶馮生。

translations.text: Boasters die for power, common people rely on life.

sentences.zh: 述迫之徒兮，或趨西東；

translations.text: Urged pressed followers, or hurry west east;

sentences.zh: 大人不曲兮，億變齊同。

translations.text: Great man not bent, hundred million changes same together.

sentences.zh: 拘士系俗兮，攌如囚拘；

translations.text: Constrained scholar tied customs, entangled like prisoner restrained;

sentences.zh: 至人遺物兮，獨與道俱。

translations.text: Perfect man abandons things, alone with way together.

sentences.zh: 眾人或或兮，好惡積意；

translations.text: Crowd confused confused, good evil accumulate intention;

sentences.zh: 真人淡漠兮，獨與道息。

translations.text: True person indifferent indifferent, alone with way rest.

sentences.zh: 釋知遺形兮，超然自喪；

translations.text: Release knowledge abandon form, transcend self-forget;

sentences.zh: 寥廓忽荒兮，與道翺翔。

translations.text: Vast empty sudden wild, with way soar fly.

sentences.zh: 乘流則逝兮，得坻則止；

translations.text: Ride current then go, obtain shore then stop;

sentences.zh: 縱軀委命兮，不私與己。

translations.text: Release body entrust fate, not private with self.

sentences.zh: 其生若浮兮，其死若休；

translations.text: His life like float, his death like rest;

sentences.zh: 澹乎若深淵之靜，氾乎若不系之舟。

translations.text: Indifferent like deep abyss quiet, broad like untied boat.

sentences.zh: 不以生故自寶兮，養空而浮；

translations.text: Not because life self-treasure, nourish emptiness float;

sentences.zh: 德人無累兮，知命不憂。

translations.text: Virtue man no burden, know fate not worry.

sentences.zh: 細故遰葪兮，何足以疑！

translations.text: Small matters far distant, what sufficient doubt!

Moreover heaven earth as furnace, creation as artisan; Yin yang as charcoal, myriad things as copper. Combine disperse wax wane, how have constant rule; Thousand changes ten thousand transformations, not begun have extreme. Suddenly become human, what sufficient control grasp; Transform become different thing, again what sufficient worry! Small knowledge self-private, belittle others value self; Greatly connected great view, things nothing cannot. Greedy man risk wealth, fierce scholars risk name; Boasters die for power, common people rely on life. Urged pressed followers, or hurry west east; Great man not bent, hundred million changes same together. Constrained scholar tied customs, entangled like prisoner restrained; Perfect man abandons things, alone with way together. Crowd confused confused, good evil accumulate intention; True person indifferent indifferent, alone with way rest. Release knowledge abandon form, transcend self-forget; Vast empty sudden wild, with way soar fly. Ride current then go, obtain shore then stop; Release body entrust fate, not private with self. His life like float, his death like rest; Indifferent like deep abyss quiet, broad like untied boat. Not because life self-treasure, nourish emptiness float; Virtue man no burden, know fate not worry. Small matters far distant, what sufficient doubt!

sentences.zh: 後歲餘，賈生徵見。

translations.text: Later year plus, Jia Sheng summoned seen.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝方受釐，坐宣室。

translations.text: Filial Wen emperor just received li, sat Xuanshi.

sentences.zh: 上因感鬼神事，而問鬼神之本。

translations.text: Above thus sensed ghosts spirits affairs, asked ghosts spirits foundation.

sentences.zh: 賈生因具道所以然之狀。

translations.text: Jia Sheng thus completely spoke its so condition.

sentences.zh: 至夜半，文帝前席。

translations.text: To midnight, Wen emperor advanced mat.

sentences.zh: 既罷，曰：「吾久不見賈生，自以為過之，今不及也。」

translations.text: Having finished, said: 'I long not see Jia Sheng, self-considered surpassed him, now cannot match.'

sentences.zh: 居頃之，拜賈生為梁懷王太傅。

translations.text: Dwelt moment, appointed Jia Sheng as Liang Huai King tutor.

sentences.zh: 梁懷王，文帝之少子，愛，而好書，故令賈生傅之。

translations.text: Liang Huai King, Wen emperor young son, loved, and liked books, thus commanded Jia Sheng tutor him.

Later year plus, Jia Sheng summoned seen. Filial Wen emperor just received li, sat Xuanshi. Above thus sensed ghosts spirits affairs, asked ghosts spirits foundation. Jia Sheng thus completely spoke its so condition. To midnight, Wen emperor advanced mat. Having finished, said: 'I long not see Jia Sheng, self-considered surpassed him, now cannot match.' Dwelt moment, appointed Jia Sheng as Liang Huai King tutor. Liang Huai King, Wen emperor young son, loved, and liked books, thus commanded Jia Sheng tutor him.

sentences.zh: 文帝復封淮南厲王子四人皆為列侯。

translations.text: Wen emperor again enfeoffed Huainan Li Wang sons four people all as marquises.

sentences.zh: 賈生諫，以為患之興自此起矣。

translations.text: Jia Sheng advised, considered calamity rise from this.

sentences.zh: 賈生數上疏，言諸侯或連數郡，非古之制，可稍削之。

translations.text: Jia Sheng several times submitted memorials, spoke various marquises connected several commanderies, not ancient system, can gradually reduce them.

sentences.zh: 文帝不聽。

translations.text: Wen emperor not listened.

Wen emperor again enfeoffed Huainan Li Wang sons four people all as marquises. Jia Sheng advised, considered calamity rise from this. Jia Sheng several times submitted memorials, spoke various marquises connected several commanderies, not ancient system, can gradually reduce them. Wen emperor not listened.

sentences.zh: 居數年，懷王騎，墮馬而死，無後。

translations.text: Dwelt several years, Huai Wang rode, fell horse died, no posterity.

sentences.zh: 賈生自傷為傅無狀，哭泣歲餘，亦死。

translations.text: Jia Sheng self-injured as tutor without achievement, wept year plus, also died.

sentences.zh: 賈生之死時年三十三矣。

translations.text: Jia Sheng death time age thirty-three.

sentences.zh: 及孝文崩，孝武皇帝立，舉賈生之孫二人至郡守，而賈嘉最好學，世其家，與余通書。

translations.text: When Filial Wen collapsed, Filial Wu emperor ascended, promoted Jia Sheng grandsons two to commandery governors, Jia Jia most liked learning, inherited family, with me exchanged letters.

sentences.zh: 至孝昭時，列為九卿。

translations.text: To Filial Zhao time, listed as nine ministers.

Dwelt several years, Huai Wang rode, fell horse died, no posterity. Jia Sheng self-injured as tutor without achievement, wept year plus, also died. Jia Sheng death time age thirty-three. When Filial Wen collapsed, Filial Wu emperor ascended, promoted Jia Sheng grandsons two to commandery governors, Jia Jia most liked learning, inherited family, with me exchanged letters. To Filial Zhao time, listed as nine ministers.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余讀離騷、天問、招魂、哀郢，悲其志。

translations.text: Grand Historian says: I read 'Li Sao', 'Tian Wen', 'Zhao Hun', 'Ai Ying', sorrowful his ambition.

sentences.zh: 適長沙，觀屈原所自沈淵，未嘗不垂涕，想見其為人。

translations.text: Passed Changsha, viewed Qu Yuan self-drowned abyss, never not shed tears, imagined saw his person.

sentences.zh: 及見賈生弔之，又怪屈原以彼其材，游諸侯，何國不容，而自令若是。

translations.text: When saw Jia Sheng mourn him, again strange Qu Yuan with his talent, traveled feudal lords, what state not contain, yet self made like this.

sentences.zh: 讀服烏賦，同死生，輕去就，又爽然自失矣。

translations.text: Read 'Fu Niao' rhapsody, same death life, light depart stay, again clearly self-lost.

Grand Historian says: I read 'Li Sao', 'Tian Wen', 'Zhao Hun', 'Ai Ying', sorrowful his ambition. Passed Changsha, viewed Qu Yuan self-drowned abyss, never not shed tears, imagined saw his person. When saw Jia Sheng mourn him, again strange Qu Yuan with his talent, traveled feudal lords, what state not contain, yet self made like this. Read 'Fu Niao' rhapsody, same death life, light depart stay, again clearly self-lost.
